segments.text: I see the entire scene from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, water floods from the sink behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's puddling around her feet silently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so content, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the jar is bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her treat eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the instability worries me deeply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall could cause injuries or broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the wood is unfortunate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks idyllic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a difference from the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
